venue.address_1: 33 Stanhope St. in the alley behind Club Cafe
venue.name: The Brahmin

item.description:
This is an occasional social for subscribers to an event newsletter published by your Lt. organizer. It is not political, but you will find more than the usual ratio of conservatives to liberals! There is a modest fee to cover food, private room and registration fees. Details at http://hhh121001.eventbrite.com/

Questions? Call Thurman at 781-729-3832.

Â
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the room to the right of the bar
item.name: Hubbub! Happy Hour
